SEARCH
Package com.litmus7.rental.vehicle.controller

Class VehicleController

java.lang.Object
com.litmus7.rental.vehicle.controller.VehicleController
public class VehicleController extends Object
The VehicleController class acts as a mediator between UI and the service layer. It handles validation, catches exceptions, and returns standardized Response objects.

Author: Joel Georgie
